tooltip.text: Ice shards pelt the target area doing 328 Frost damage over 8 seconds.

Draws on the soul of the friendly target to shield them, absorbing 44 damage. Lasts 30 seconds. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage. Once shielded, the target cannot be shielded again for 15 seconds.
Backstab the target, causing 175% weapon damage plus 15 to the target. Must be behind the target. Requires a dagger in the main hand. Awards 1 combo point.
A defensive combat stance. Decreases damage taken by -10% and damage and healing caused by -10%. Increases threat generated.
Bash the target with your shield dazing them and interrupting spellcasting, which prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 6 seconds.
A strong attack that increases melee damage by 11 and causes a high amount of threat.
The druid roars, decreasing nearby enemies' melee attack power by -31. Lasts 30 seconds.
Charge an enemy, generate 9 rage, and root it for 1.5 seconds.
Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, causing 20 to 20 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by -40% for 5 seconds. This ability deals 20% reduced damage to players.

Transforms the enemy into a sheep, forcing it to wander around for up to 20 seconds. While wandering, the sheep cannot attack or cast spells but will regenerate very quickly. Any damage will transform the target back into its normal form. Only one target can be polymorphed at a time. Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.
Targets in a cone in front of the caster take 113 to 113 Frost damage and are slowed by -50% for 8 seconds. Deals 10% reduced damage to players.
Blasts enemies near the caster for 22 to 22 Frost damage and freezes them in place for up to 8 seconds. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.
Summons an Eye of Kilrogg and binds your vision to it.  The eye moves quickly but is very fragile.
Slows friendly party or raid target's falling speed for 30 seconds.
Allows the target to breathe underwater for 10 minutes.
Allows the friendly target to detect lesser invisibility for 10 minutes.
Hurls a fiery ball that causes 16 to 24 Fire damage and an additional 4 Fire damage over 4 seconds.
Heals your pet for $ health over 15 seconds.
Heals the target for $ over 15 seconds.

Increases Armor by 30. If an enemy strikes the caster, they may have their movement slowed by -15% and the time between their attacks increased by -20% for 5 seconds. Only one type of Armor spell can be active on the Mage at any time. Lasts -0.001 seconds.
Corrupts the target, causing 48 Shadow damage over 12 seconds. Deals 20% reduced damage to players.

The caster is surrounded by 3 balls of lightning. When a spell, melee or ranged attack hits the caster, the attacker will be struck for 16 Nature damage. This expends one lightning ball. Only one ball will fire every few seconds. Lasts 10 minutes. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at any one time. Deals 45% less damage to players.
Heals a friendly target for 34 to 44.
Roots the target in place and causes 28 Nature damage over 12 seconds. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.
Burns the enemy for 15 Fire damage and then an additional 45 Fire damage over 15 seconds. Deals 10% reduced damage to players.
Taunts the target to attack you, but has no effect if the target is already attacking you.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial magic effect.
Casts a bolt of lightning at the target for 15 to 18 Nature damage.
Finishing move that stuns the target. Lasts longer per combo point: 1 point : 1 second 2 points: 2 seconds 3 points: 3 seconds 4 points: 4 seconds 5 points: 5 seconds

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 263 to 299 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Each jump reduces the damage by 30%. Affects 3 total targets. Deals 15% reduced damage to players.
Soothes the target, reducing the range at which it will attack you by -10 yards. Only affects Humanoid targets. Lasts 15 seconds.
Gives 40 additional armor to party and raid members within 40 yards. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.
Thorns sprout from the friendly target causing 3 Nature damage to attackers when hit. Lasts 10 minutes.
Removes 1 Curse from a friendly target.

Reduces all damage taken by -50% for 6 seconds. Once protected, the target cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, or Hand of Protection again for 2 minutes. Cannot be used within 30 seconds of using Avenging Wrath.
Cures 1 poison effect and 1 disease effect on a friendly target.
Dispels magic on the target, removing 1 harmful spell from a friend or 1 beneficial spell from an enemy.
Removes 1 disease from the friendly target.
Absorbs 165 Fire damage. Lasts 30 seconds.
Allows the friendly target to walk across water for 10 minutes. Any damage will cancel the effect.
Attempts to cure 1 disease effect on the target, and 1 more disease effect every 3 seconds for 12 seconds.
Yanks the caster through the twisting nether back to [$z].  Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.
Smite an enemy for 20 to 27 Holy damage. Deals 15% reduced damage to players.
Fade out, temporarily reducing all your threat for 10 seconds. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Conjures 2 muffins, providing the mage and [$ghis:her;] allies with something to eat. Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.
A burst of Holy energy fills the caster, increasing armor by 175. Each melee or ranged damage hit against the priest will remove one charge. Lasts -0.001 seconds or until 20 charges are used.
A word of darkness that causes 48 Shadow damage over 18 seconds.
A powerful prayer heals the friendly target's party members within 30 yards for 301 to 321.

Curses the target with impending doom, causing 3200 Shadow damage after 1 minute. If the target yields experience or honor when it dies from this damage, a Doomguard will be summoned. Cannot be cast on players.
Dampens magic used against the targeted party member, decreasing damage taken from spells by -3% and healing spells by -3%. Lasts 10 minutes.
Controls a humanoid mind up to level 32, but increases the time between its attacks by -25%. Lasts up to 1 minute.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to the Paladin's maximum health. If used on self, the Paladin cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, Hand of Protection, or self-targeted Lay on Hands again for 2 minutes. Also cannot be used on self within 30 seconds of using Avenging Wrath.
Heals a friendly target for 50 to 60.

Protects the paladin from all damage and spells for 6 seconds, but reduces all damage you deal by -50%. Once protected, the target cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, or Hand of Protection again for 2 minutes. Cannot be used within 30 seconds of using Avenging Wrath or Ice Block.
Disarm the enemy's main hand and ranged weapons for 10 seconds.
Sends a shadowy bolt at the enemy, causing 17 to 22 Shadow damage.

Protects the caster, increasing armor by 30, and increasing the amount of health generated through spells and effects by 5%. The healing effect does not stack with other similar effects. Only one type of Armor spell can be active on the Warlock at any time. Lasts -0.001 seconds.
Summons an Imp under the command of the Warlock.
Transfers 11 health every 1 sec from the target to the caster. Lasts 5 seconds.
Summons a Felhunter under the command of the Warlock. Requires Drain Soul to use.

Creates a Minor Soulstone. The Soulstone can be used to store one target's soul. If the target dies while his soul is stored, he will be able to resurrect with -400 health and [$q1] mana. Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.
A mocking attack that causes a moderate amount of threat and forces the target to focus attacks on you for 6 seconds. If the target is not a player, also deals weapon damage.
Summons a Voidwalker under the command of the Warlock. Requires Drain Soul to use.

Begins a ritual that creates a summoning portal. The summoning portal can be used by 2 party or raid members to summon a targeted party or raid member. The ritual portal requires the caster and 2 additional party or raid members to complete. In order to participate, all players must be out of combat and right-click the portal and not move until the ritual is complete. Cannot be used in Dungeons and Raids on High-risk Realms.
Target's melee attack power is reduced by -21 and armor is reduced by -5% for 2 minutes. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.
Garrote the enemy, silencing them for 3 seconds and causing {(20+AP*0.07)*6} damage over 18 seconds, increased by your attack power. Must be stealthed and behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.

Banishes the enemy target, preventing all action but making it invulnerable for up to 20 seconds. Only one target can be banished at a time. Casting Banish on a banished target will cancel the spell. Only works on Demons and Elementals.
Summons a Succubus under the command of the Warlock. Requires Drain Soul to use.

Creates a Holy Lightwell. Friendly players can click the Lightwell to restore 801 health over 6 seconds. Attacks done to you equal to 30% of your total health will cancel the effect. Lightwell lasts for 3 minutes or 10 charges.
Heals all nearby group members for 351 every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. Druid must channel to maintain the spell.
Gives 12 health to the caster's pet every second for 10 seconds as long as the caster channels.
Conjures a mana agate that can be used to instantly restore 390 to 410 mana. 3 charges.
Shapeshift into cat form, increasing melee attack power by 40 plus 75% of Agility. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects and allows the use of various cat abilities.
Decrease the armor of the target by -5% for 5 minutes. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.
Wounds the target causing them to bleed for 45 damage plus an additional {0.2*5*((NaNWB+NaNwb)/2+AP/14*NaNWS)} (based on weapon damage) over 15 seconds.
Heals the target for 35 over 15 seconds.
Swipe nearby enemies, inflicting 9 damage. Damage increased by attack power.

You attempt to disengage from combat, leaping backwards.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Shapeshift into travel form, increasing movement speed by 40%. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects. Only useable outdoors. The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.
A sweeping attack that does your weapon damage plus 15 to the target and his nearest ally.
Stuns the target for 3 seconds and interrupts non-player spellcasting for 3 seconds.
Reduces all damage taken by -60% for 12 seconds.

Causes {96+0.2*NaN to NaNAPH+0.2*P} to {96+0.2*NaN to NaNAPH+0.2*P} Holy damage to an enemy target. Deals 30% reduced damage to players. If the target is Undead or Demon, it will always critically hit.
Pick the target's pocket.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, reducing casting or channeling time lost when damaged by 30% and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for $. This effect can only occur once every few seconds. 4 charges. Lasts 10 minutes. Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.
Increases the target's resistance to Shadow spells by 30 for 30 minutes.

Curses the target with agony, causing 96 Shadow damage over 24 seconds. This damage is dealt slowly at first, and builds up as the Curse reaches its full duration. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.
Take direct control of your pet and see through its eyes for 1 minute.
Amplifies magic used against the targeted party member, increasing damage taken from spells by 3% and healing spells by 3%. Lasts 10 minutes.

A targeted party or raid member is protected from all physical attacks for 6 seconds, but during that time they cannot attack or use physical abilities. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time. Once protected, the target cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, or Hand of Protection again for 2 minutes. Cannot be targeted on players who have used Avenging Wrath within the last 30 seconds.
Places a Hand on the party or raid member, reducing their total threat by -5% every 1 sec. for 10 seconds. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.
Places a Hand on the friendly target, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 6 seconds. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.

Heals the friendly target for 320 to 368, then jumps to heal additional nearby targets. If cast on a party member, the heal will only jump to other party members. Each jump reduces the effectiveness of the heal by 40%. Heals 3 total targets.
Shapeshift into aquatic form, increasing swim speed by 50% and allowing the druid to breathe underwater. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects.

Finishing move that causes damage over time. Damage increases per combo point and by your attack power: 1 point: {(3+[$b1]*1+0.01*AP)*$} damage over 12 seconds. 2 points: {(3+[$b1]*2+0.02*AP)*$} damage over 12 seconds. 3 points: {(3+[$b1]*3+0.03*AP)*$} damage over 12 seconds. 4 points: {(3+[$b1]*4+0.04*AP)*$} damage over 12 seconds. 5 points: {(3+[$b1]*5+0.05*AP)*$} damage over 12 seconds. Deals 20% less damage to players.
Claw the enemy, causing 27 additional damage. Awards 1 combo point.

Enslaves the target demon, up to level 32, forcing it to do your bidding. While enslaved, the time between the demon's attacks is increased by -30% and its casting speed is slowed by -20%. Lasts up to 5 minutes.

Drains the soul of the target, causing 75 Shadow damage over 15 seconds. If the target is at or below 25% health, Drain Soul causes four times the normal damage. If the target dies while being drained, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Soul Shard. Each time the Drain Soul damages the target, it also has a chance to generate a Soul Shard. Soul Shards are required for other spells.

Summons a meteor from the Twisting Nether, causing 200 Fire damage and stunning all enemy targets in the area for 2 seconds. An Infernal rises from the crater, under the command of the caster for 1 minute.
Increases the friendly target's armor by 20 for 30 minutes.

Places the Hunter's Mark on the target, increasing the ranged attack power of all attackers against that target by 20. In addition, the target of this ability can always be seen by the hunter whether it stealths or turns invisible. The target also appears on the mini-map. Lasts for 5 minutes.
Purifies the friendly target, removing 1 disease effect and 1 poison effect.
Reduces the melee attack power of all enemies within 10 yards by -35 for 30 seconds.
Forces all enemies within 10 yards to focus attacks on you for 6 seconds.
Power infuses the target, increasing their Stamina by 3 for 30 minutes.
Instantly attacks with both weapons for 100% weapon damage plus an additional 44 with each weapon. Damage is increased by 30% against Poisoned targets. Awards 2 combo points.
Causes an explosion of arcane magic around the caster, causing 35 to 40 Arcane damage to all targets within 10 yards.
Converts {27+NaN to NaNAPI*1.5} health into {27*1+NaN to NaNAPS*.5*1} mana. Spell power increases the amount of mana returned.
Increases the target's Intellect by 2 for 30 minutes.

Gather information about the target beast.  The tooltip will display damage, health, armor, any special resistances, and diet.  In addition, Beast Lore will reveal whether or not the creature is tameable and what abilities the tamed creature has.
Absorbs 120 damage, draining mana instead. Drains [$e] mana per damage absorbed. Lasts 1 minute.
Slams the opponent, causing weapon damage plus 64.

Curses the target for 5 minutes, reducing Arcane, Fire, Frost, Holy, Nature, and Shadow resistances by -45 and increasing magic damage taken by 6%. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.
Shows the location of all nearby beasts on the minimap.  Only one form of tracking can be active at a time.
Attack the enemy for {[$R]AAPP*0.7+15} damage. Deals 15% reduced damage to players.

Place a frost trap that freezes the first enemy that approaches, preventing all action for up to 10 seconds. Any damage caused will break the ice. Trap will exist for 30 seconds. Only one trap can be active at a time.
Continuously fires a volley of ammo at the target area, causing {[$R]AAPP*0.1+52} Arcane damage to enemy targets within 8 yards every {6 seconds/6}.2 seconds for 6 seconds.
Scares a beast, causing it to run in fear for up to 10 seconds. Damage caused may interrupt the effect. Only one beast can be feared at a time.
Causes the shaman's active Fire totem to emit a wave of flames, inflicting 48 to 56 Fire damage to enemies within 10 yards of the totem.
Exposes all hidden and invisible enemies within 10 yards of the targeted area for 20 seconds.
In a whirlwind of steel you attack up to 4 enemies within 8 yards, causing weapon damage from both melee weapons to each enemy.

Allows the friendly party or raid target to levitate, floating a few feet above the ground. While levitating, the target will fall at a reduced speed and travel over water. Any damage will cancel the effect. Lasts 2 minutes.
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by -25%. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target. Lasts 30 seconds.
Maims the enemy, reducing movement speed by -50% for 15 seconds.
Your next 3 warrior abilites have an additional 100% to critically hit but all damage taken is increased by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.
Throws a distraction, attracting the attention of all nearby monsters for 10 seconds. Does not break stealth.
An instant strike that causes 3 damage in addition to 100% of your normal weapon damage (80% if a Two-Handed weapon is equipped). Awards 1 combo point.
A quick kick that interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 5 seconds.
Causes {1+0.21*AP} damage, incapacitating the opponent for 4 seconds, and turns off your attack. Target must be facing you. Any damage caused will revive the target. Awards 1 combo point.
Allows the rogue to sneak around, but reduces your speed by -30%. Removes Divine Shield. Lasts 20 seconds.
Allows opening of locked chests and doors.
Rake the target for {AP/20+18} bleed damage and an additional {33*3+AP*0.225} damage over 9 seconds. Awards 1 combo point. Deals 20% less damage to players.
Stuns the target for 4 seconds. Must be stealthed. Awards 2 combo points.
Disarm a hostile trap.
Increases movement speed by 50% while in Cat Form for 15 seconds. Does not break prowling.
Allows the rogue to vanish from sight, entering an improved stealth mode for 10 seconds. Also breaks movement impairing effects. Removes Divine Shield when used.
Reduces damage from falling.

Finishing move that causes damage over time, increased by your attack power. Lasts longer per combo point: 1 point : {(8+[$b1]*1+0.015*AP)*4} damage over $ secs 2 points: {(8+[$b1]*2+0.024*AP)*5} damage over $ secs 3 points: {(8+[$b1]*3+0.03*AP)*6} damage over $ secs 4 points: {(8+[$b1]*4+0.03428571*AP)*7} damage over $ secs 5 points: {(8+[$b1]*5+0.0375*AP)*8} damage over $ secs
Ignites the area surrounding the caster, causing 95 Fire damage to [$ghimself:herself;] and 95 Fire damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec. Lasts 15 seconds.
Teleports the caster 20 yards forward, unless something is in the way. Also frees the caster from stuns and bonds.
Performs a feint, causing no damage but lowering your threat by a small amount, making the enemy less likely to attack you.
Stings the target, causing {[$R]AAPP*0.3+4*15 seconds/3} Nature damage over 15 seconds. Deals 20% reduced damage to players. Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on any one target.
Brings a dead player back to life with 70 health and [$q1] mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.
Returns the spirit to the body, restoring a dead target to life with 65 health and [$q1] mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.
Heal your target for 46 to 56.
Heal your target for 295 to 341.
A slow casting spell that heals a single target for 899 to 1013.
Heals a friendly target for 193 to 237.
Blinds the target, causing it to wander disoriented for up to 10 seconds. Any damage caused will remove the effect.
Allows the caster to see through the target's eyes for 1 minute.

Finishing move that causes damage per combo point: 1 point : {1+(([$b1]*1)+AP*0.03)*1}-{1+(([$b1]*1)+AP*0.07)*1} damage 2 points: {1+(([$b1]*2)+AP*0.06)*1}-{1+(([$b1]*2)+AP*0.14)*1} damage 3 points: {1+(([$b1]*3)+AP*0.09)*1}-{1+(([$b1]*3)+AP*0.21)*1} damage 4 points: {1+(([$b1]*4)+AP*0.12)*1}-{1+(([$b1]*4)+AP*0.28)*1} damage 5 points: {1+(([$b1]*5)+AP*0.15)*1}-{1+(([$b1]*5)+AP*0.35)*1} damage
Calls down a pillar of fire, burning all enemies within the area for 57 to 75 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 8 seconds.
Blasts the enemy for 27 to 36 Fire damage.Blasts the enemy for 27 to 36 Fire damage. Deals 10% reduced damage to players.
Counters the enemy's spellcast, preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 6 seconds. Generates a high amount of threat.
While applied to target weapon it increases damage dealt by periodic Warlock spells by 2% and spell haste rating by 10. Lasts for 1 hour.
A balanced combat stance that increases the armor penetration of all of your attacks by 10% and gives your Rend damage over time effect a chance to critically hit.
An aggressive stance. Your critical chance is increased by 3% and all damage taken is increased by 5%.
Summons an Earthbind Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 45 seconds that slows the movement speed of enemies within 10 yards. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Increases your chance to block and block value by 100% for 10 seconds.
Forces the enemy target to sleep for up to 20 seconds. Any damage will awaken the target. Only one target can be forced to hibernate at a time. Only works on Beasts and Dragonkin.
Fires several missiles, hitting 3 targets for 130% weapon damage. Deals 20% reduced damage to players.
Turns the Shaman into a Ghost Wolf, increasing speed by 40%. As a Ghost Wolf, the Shaman is less hindered by effects that would reduce movement speed. Only useable outdoors.
Generates 20 rage at the cost of health, and then generates an additional 11 rage over 10 seconds. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Dispels 1 Curse from a friendly target.
Sends bolts of holy power in all directions, causing {399+0.15*NaN to NaNAPH+0.15*P} to {399+0.15*NaN to NaNAPH+0.15*P} Holy damage and stunning all Undead and Demon targets within 10 yds for .
Greatly increased chance to detect traps.
You can create and mix poisons, with both found and storebought ingredients.
Attempts to cure 1 poison effect on the target, and 1 more poison effect every 3 seconds for 12 seconds.
Soothes the target beast, reducing the range at which it will attack you by -10 yards. Only affects Beast and Dragonkin targets level 40 or lower. Lasts 15 seconds.
Causes 135 to 163 Arcane damage to the target.
Afflicts the target with a disease that causes 184 Shadow damage over 24 seconds. 15% of damage caused by the Devouring Plague heals the caster. This spell can only affect one target at a time.
Scorch the enemy for 72 to 89 Fire damage.
A strong attack that increases melee damage by 11.
Maims the enemy, reducing the target's movement speed by -50% for 10 seconds.
Increases the rogue's movement speed by 50% for 12 seconds. Does not break stealth.

Stings the target, draining 16% mana over 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 32% of the caster's maximum mana), and energizing the Hunter equal to the amount drained. Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on any one target.
Stings the target, reducing chance to hit with melee and ranged attacks by -3% for 20 seconds. Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on any one target.
An instant shot that causes {[$R]AAPP*0.30+10} Arcane damage. Deals 20% reduced damage to players.
Increases ranged attack speed by 40% for 15 seconds.
Summons a Searing Totem with 5 health at your feet for 30 seconds that repeatedly attacks an enemy within [$r1] yards for 9 to 11 Fire damage. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Fires a Black Arrow at the target, increasing all damage done by you to the target by 8% and dealing {[$R]AAPP*0.15+157*5} Shadow damage over 15 seconds.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing 1 poison effect, 1 disease effect, and 1 magic effect.
Dazes the target, slowing movement speed by -50% for 4 seconds.
The hunter takes on the aspects of a cheetah, increasing movement speed by 30%. If the hunter is struck, [$ghe:she;] will be dazed for 4 seconds. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.
Transfers 4% of target's maximum mana every 1 sec from the target to the caster (up to a maximum of 8% of the caster's maximum mana every 1 sec). Lasts 5 seconds.
Launches Arcane Missiles at the enemy, causing 24 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 3 seconds. Deals 15% reduced damage to players.
Finishing move that increases melee attack speed by 10%. Lasts longer per combo point: 1 point : 9 seconds 2 points: 12 seconds 3 points: 15 seconds 4 points: 18 seconds 5 points: 21 seconds
Causes 22 to 24 Nature damage to the target.
Heals a friendly target for 37 to 51.
Forces all nearby enemies within 10 yards to focus attacks on you for 6 seconds.
Stuns the target for 2 seconds and interrupts non-player spellcasting for 3 seconds.
Allows the Druid to prowl around, but reduces your movement speed by -30%. Lasts 20 seconds.
Increases damage done by 10 for 6 seconds.

Shred the target, causing 248% damage plus 64 to the target. Must be behind the target. Awards 1 combo point. Effects which increase Bleed damage also increase Shred damage. Deals 20% less damage to players.
Generates 20 rage, and then generates an additional 11 rage over 10 seconds, but reduces base armor by 27% in Bear Form and 16% in Dire Bear Form.
The warrior shouts, causing up to 5 enemies within 8 yards to cower in fear. The targeted enemy will be unable to move while cowering. Lasts 8 seconds. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Increases your dodge chance by 50% and reduces the chance ranged attacks hit you by -50%. Lasts 10 seconds. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

Attempt to finish off a wounded foe, causing {112+AP*0.2} damage and converting each extra point of rage into NaN additional damage (up to a maximum cost of 30 rage). Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.
Feign death which may trick enemies into ignoring you. Lasts up to 6 minutes. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Summons a Healing Stream Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 5 minutes that heals group members within 30 yards for 9 every 2 seconds. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Howl, causing 5 enemies within 10 yds to flee in terror for 6 seconds. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

Shapeshift into bear form, increasing melee attack power by 30, armor contribution from cloth and leather items by 20%, and Stamina by 15%. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects and allows the use of various bear abilities.
Shows the location of all nearby demons on the minimap until cancelled.  Only one form of tracking can be active at a time.
Shows the location of all nearby undead on the minimap until cancelled.   Only one form of tracking can be active at a time.
Conjures 2 bottles of water, providing the mage and [$ghis:her;] allies with something to drink. Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.
The enemy target is swarmed by insects, decreasing their chance to hit by -3% and causing 162 Nature damage over 12 seconds.

Summons a Mana Spring Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 5 minutes that restores 16 mana every 5 seconds to all party and raid members within 30 yards. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Inflict searing pain on the enemy target, causing 44 to 53 Fire damage. Causes a high amount of threat.
Allows the target to breathe underwater for 10 minutes.

Summons a Stoneclaw Totem with 50 health at the feet of the caster for 15 seconds that taunts creatures within 8 yards to attack it. Enemies attacking the Stoneclaw Totem have a 50% chance to be stunned for 3 seconds. Stoneclaw totem also protects all your totems, causing them to absorb 21 damage. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Calls down a fiery rain to burn enemies in the area of effect for 276 Fire damage over 8 seconds.
Strikes fear in the enemy, causing it to run in fear for up to 10 seconds on monsters and up to 8 seconds on players. Damage caused may interrupt the effect. Only 1 target can be feared at a time.
Increases the damage of your Holy spells by 2%.
Increases the damage of your Holy spells by 6%.
Increases the range of Throw and Deadly Throw by 2 yards and gives your Deadly Throw a 50% chance to interrupt the target for 3 seconds.

Increases your resistance to all magic by 5 and allows 25% of your mana regeneration to continue while casting. Only one type of Armor spell can be active on the Mage at any time. Lasts -0.001 seconds.
Absorbs 165 Frost damage. Lasts 30 seconds.
Changes the caster's viewpoint to the targeted location. Lasts 1 minute. Only useable outdoors.
Zooms in the hunter's vision. Only usable outdoors. Lasts 1 minute.
Creates a Minor Healthstone that can be used to instantly restore 100 health. Conjured items disappear if logged out for more than 15 minutes.
Absorbs 290 shadow damage. Lasts 30 seconds.

Blasts nearby enemies increasing the time between their attacks by -10% for 10 seconds and doing 15 damage to them. Damage increased by attack power. This ability causes additional threat, and causes 25% more damage with a Two-Handed weapon equipped.
Wards the friendly target against Fear. The next Fear effect used against the target will fail, using up the ward. Lasts 3 minutes.
Burn the enemy's soul, causing 623 to 783 Fire damage.
While applied to target weapon it increases damage dealt by spells by 1% and spell critical strike rating by 7. Lasts for 1 hour.

Summons an immobile Sentry Totem with 100 health at your feet for 5 minutes that allows vision of nearby area and warns of enemies that attack it. Right-Click on buff to switch back and forth between totem sight and shaman sight. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Pummel the target, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 4 seconds.
Instantly counterattack an enemy for {99+AP*0.190} to {99+AP*0.190} damage. Revenge is only usable after the warrior blocks, dodges or parries an attack.
The warrior shouts, increasing attack power of all raid and party members within 30 yards by 15. Lasts 5 minutes. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Incapacitates the target for up to 25 seconds. Must be stealthed. Only works on Humanoids that are not in combat. Any damage caused will revive the target. Only 1 target may be sapped at a time.
Ravage the target, causing 385% damage plus 162 to the target. Must be prowling and behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.
Causes the enemy target to run in horror for 3 seconds and causes 163 Shadow damage. The caster gains {100*[$e1]}% of the damage caused in health.

You have a 12% chance to hit your target with a Lightning Shield orb charge when you deal damage with melee attacks and abilities, and your Lightning Shield gains 6 additional charges.

Increases the damage done by your shots and the damage done by your tamed pet's special abilities by 1% on marked targets, and increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Aimed Shot, Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, Kill Shot and Chimera Shot by 2%.
When your tamed pet scores a critical hit with a special ability, you have a 50% chance to instantly regenerate 2% mana.

You have a 20% chance when you critically hit with Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, Kill Shot, Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite, or Counterattack to cause your tamed pet's next 2 special attacks to critically hit.
Reduces the cooldown of your Bestial Wrath, Intimidation and Tamed Pet Special Abilities by -10%.

Aspect of the Viper - Reduces the damage and healing penalty by 10%. Aspect of the Monkey - Reduces the damage done to you while active by -2%. Aspect of the Hawk - Increases the attack power bonus by 30%. Aspect of the Dragonhawk - Combines the bonuses from Aspect of the Monkey and Hawk.
You master the art of Beast training, teaching you the ability to tame Exotic pets and increasing your total amount of Pet Skill Points by 6.

Increases your total Agility by an additional 1%, and your Arcane Shot, Explosive Shot and Steady Shot critical strikes have a 33% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of the maximum mana per 5 sec. Lasts for 15 seconds.

If Wyvern Sting is dispelled, the dispeller is also afflicted by Wyvern Sting lasting 16% of the duration remaining, and increases all damage done by you on targets afflicted by your Serpent Sting by 1%.
Increases the critical strike chance of all of your ranged and melee attacks on targets affected by your Counterattack, Frost Trap, Freezing Trap and Freezing Arrow by 3%.

You fire an explosive charge into the enemy target, dealing {[$R]AAPP*0.1+144}-{[$R]AAPP*0.1+144} Fire damage. The charge will blast the target every second for an additional 2 seconds. Deals 30% reduced damage to players.

Increases the critical strike chance of your Kill Shot ability by 5%, and while standing still for 6 sec, you gain Sniper Training increasing the damage done by your Steady Shot, Arcane Shot, Aimed Shot, Black Arrow and Explosive Shot by 3% for 15 seconds.

Increases the critical strike chance of Hammer of Wrath by 25%, reduces the cooldown of Avenging Wrath by -30 secs and while affected by Avenging Wrath 25% of all damage caused bypasses damage reduction effects.
Your auras also increase casting, ranged, and melee attack speeds by 1% and when you use Crusader Strike you gain 1% attack speed for 8 seconds. This effect stacks 2 times.
When your Judgement, Crusader Strike and Divine Storm spells deal a critical strike, your target will take 15% additional damage over 8 seconds.
An instant weapon attack that causes 110% of weapon damage to up to 4 enemies within 8 yards. The Divine Storm heals up to 3 party or raid members totaling 25% of the damage caused.

Unleashes the energy of a Seal spell to judge an enemy for 20 seconds, preventing them from fleeing and limiting their movement speed. Refer to individual Seals for additional Judgement effect. Only one Judgement per Paladin can be active at any one time.

Unleashes the energy of a Seal spell to judge an enemy for 20 seconds, giving each attack a chance to restore 2% of the attacker's base mana. Refer to individual Seals for additional Judgement effect. Only one Judgement per Paladin can be active at any one time.

Increases the damage of your Judgement, Crusader Strike and Divine Storm abilities by 5% and when one of those abilities or your normal attacks critically hit the cast time of your next Flash of Light or Exorcism is reduced by 1.2 sec and the effectiveness is increased by 15% (5% to players).

Increases the damage of your Judgement, Crusader Strike and Divine Storm abilities by 10% and when one of those abilities or your normal attacks critically hit the cast time of your next Flash of Light or Exorcism is reduced by 0.2 sec and the effectiveness is increased by 30% (10% to players).
Increases your bonus spell healing by an amount equal to 2% of your melee attack power and your critical healing spells heal the target for 5% of the healed amount over 12 seconds.

When Divine Sacrifice is activated, your party and raid members within 30 yards take -10% reduced damage for 6 seconds. In addition, increases the duration of your Sacred Shield by 50% and the amount absorbed by 10%.
Your Cleanse spell has a 10% chance to increase the target's resistance to Disease, Magic and Poison by 30% for 10 seconds.
Increases the range of your Judgement of Light and Judgement of Wisdom spells by 10 yards and increases your chance to hit with all spells and attacks by 2%.
Increases the range of your Judgement of Light and Judgement of Wisdom spells by 20 yards and increases your chance to hit with all spells and attacks by 4%.

The target becomes a Beacon of Light to all members of your party or raid within a 60 yard radius. Any direct heals you cast on party or raid members will also heal the Beacon for 25% of the amount healed. Only one target can be the Beacon of Light at a time. Lasts 1 minute.

Your Holy Shock critical hits reduce the cast time of your next Flash of Light by 1.2 sec or increase the critical chance of your next Holy Light by 10%. In addition, causes your Flash of Light to heal targets with Sacred Shield for an additional 50% over 12 seconds.

Your Holy Shock critical hits reduce the cast time of your next Flash of Light by 2.1 sec or increase the critical chance of your next Holy Light by 20%. In addition, causes your Flash of Light to heal targets with Sacred Shield for an additional 100% over 12 seconds.

Reduces spell damage taken by -2% and gives a 50% chance to refresh the duration of your Divine Plea when you hit an enemy. In addition, your Divine Plea spell is 50% less likely to be dispelled. Increases the duration of Divine Shield and Divine Protection by 3 sec.
Increases your spell power by an amount equal to 5% of your Strength and increases the amount healed by your Holy critical heals by 5%.
Hammer the current target and up to 2 additional nearby targets, causing 3 times your main hand damage per second as Holy damage.
Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Steady Shot by 23%, and increases your chance to hit with ranged and melee attacks by 1%.

Reduces the mana cost of Hand of Freedom, Hand of Sacrifice and Hand of Salvation by -15%, increases the effectiveness of Hand of Salvation by 50% and the effectiveness of Hand of Sacrifice by an additional 5%.
Increases the damage done by your Seal spells by 7%, your Judgement spells by 5%. Also your Judgement spells increase your haste by 2% for 1 minute.

Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice by -5 sec, increases the duration of your Seal of Justice effect by 0.5 sec and your Judgement spells also reduce the melee attack speed of the target by -10%.
Reduces all damage taken by -1% and grants your Avenger's Shield a 33% chance to silence your targets for 3 seconds.

Reduces the cast time by 0.15 sec and causes your Fear spell to inflict a Nightmare on the target when the fear effect ends. The Nightmare effect reduces the target's movement speed by -15% for 5 seconds.

Your Felhunter regains 4% of its maximum mana each time it hits with its Shadow Bite ability and the cooldown on Shadow Bite and Devour Magic is reduced by 2 sec. In addition, increases the effect of your Felhunter's Fel Intelligence by 5%.

Your Soul Leech effect also restores mana to you and your summoned demon equal to 1% of maximum mana, and has a 50% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of maximum mana per 5 sec. Lasts for 15 seconds.
Increases the damage done by your Seal spells by 20%, your Judgement spells by 15%. Also your Judgement spells increase your haste by 6% for 1 minute.
Increases your summoned demon's critical strike chance equal to 10% of your critical strike chance.

Gives your Arcane Blast and Starfire a 27% chance, and your Arcane Barrage, Fireball, Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt and Moonfire spells spells a 14% chance to reduce the channeled duration of the next Arcane Missiles spell by -2 secs, reduce the mana cost by -100%, and missiles will fire every .5 secs.

Gives your Arcane Blast and Starfire a 40% chance, and your Arcane Barrage, Fireball, Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt and Moonfire spells spells a 20% chance to reduce the channeled duration of the next Arcane Missiles spell by -2 secs, reduce the mana cost by -100%, and missiles will fire every .5 secs.

Increases the target's chance to critically hit with spells by 3%. When the target critically hits the caster's chance to critically hit with spells is increased by 3% for 10 seconds. Cannot be cast on self.

After being hit by a spell or ability with an Interrupt or Silence mechanic you have a 50% chance to become immune to the next Interrupt or Silence mechanic. Lasts 12 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Cold Snap, Ice Barrier and Summon Water Elemental spells by -10%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Healing Wave, Lesser Healing Wave, Chain Heal, and Riptide by 60%. Each critical heal reduces the chance by 20%. Lasts 20 seconds.
Increases your pet's damage by 4% and you and your pet's movement speed by 2% while your pet is active. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.
Increases the damage done by your Explosive Shot, Explosive Trap, Black Arrow and Immolation Trap by 2%.
Increases your attack power and ranged attack power equal to 7% of your total Stamina. Also increases the damage of your tamed pet by 2%.

You have a 33% chance when you trap a target with Freezing Trap, Freezing Arrow or Frost Trap and a 2% chance when you deal periodic damage with your Immolation Trap, Explosive Trap or Black Arrow to cause your next 2 Arcane Shot or Explosive Shot spells to trigger no cooldown, cost no mana and consume no ammo. This effect has a 22 sec cooldown.

Your main hand melee, and melee special critical hits Enrage you, increasing damage caused by your Overpower, Mortal Strike, Execute, Rend, and Bladestorm abilities by 15% for 12 seconds. This effect is only active in Battle Stance and does not stack with Enrage.

Whenever your Rend ability causes damage, you have a 33% chance of allowing the use of your Overpower ability for 9 seconds and increasing its damage by 10%. 1 charge. This effect will not occur more than once every 4 sec.

Whenever your Rend ability causes damage, you have a 100% chance of allowing the use of your Overpower ability for 9 seconds and increasing its damage by 10%. 1 charge. This effect will not occur more than once every 4 sec.
A steady shot that causes unmodified weapon damage, plus ammo, plus {[$R]AAPP*0.26+45}. Causes an additional 175 against Dazed targets.
Increases the damage done by your Slam, Whirlwind and Bloodthirst abilities by 5%.

Increases the critical effect chance of your Flash Heal, Greater Heal and Penance (Heal) spells by 2% on targets afflicted by the Weakened Soul effect, and you have a 50% chance to reduce all damage taken by -3% for 1 minute to all friendly party and raid targets when you cast Power Word: Shield. This effect has a 15 sec cooldown.
Your Charge, Intercept, and Intervene abilities will remove all slowing effects when used.
Increases the damage and healing done by the periodic spell damage and healing effects of your Druid spells by 2%.
Increases your Nature damage done to targets afflicted by your Insect Swarm by 2%, and increases your Arcane damage done by 2% on targets afflicted by your Moonfire spell.
Increases the duration of your Moonfire and Rejuvenation spells by 3 sec, your Regrowth spell by 6 sec, and your Insect Swarm and Lifebloom spells by 2 sec.
While in Bear or Dire Bear Form your attack power is increased by 2% and the damage you take is reduced by -4%.
Increases your dodge rating by 11% of your Agility while in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form, and you regenerate 4 rage every time you dodge while in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form.

Instantly blasts the target with a gust of wind, causing no damage but interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 seconds. Also lowers your threat, making the enemy less likely to attack you.
Increases your total melee attack power by 2% and all physical damage caused to enemies you have poisoned is increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowstep by -5 sec and energy cost by -5 of your Tricks of the Trade and Distract abilities and reduces the cooldown of Preparation by -1.5 min.
While stealthed, and for 20 seconds after breaking stealth, you regenerate 30% additional energy.

Grants the periodic damage from your Corruption and Unstable Affliction spells the ability to critically hit for 100% increased damage, and increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Haunt spell by 100%. Also allows your Corruption spell to benefit from haste.
Whenever you take damage from or block a melee attack you cause damage equal to 10% of your block value. Deals 25% reduced damage to players.
Reduces the chance you'll be hit by spells by -2% and when the ability is used it will reflect the first spell cast against the 2 closest party members within 20 yards.

You transform into a Demon for 30 seconds. This form increases your armor from cloth by 130%, damage by 20%, reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 6% and reduces the duration of stun and snare effects by -50%. You gain some unique demon abilities in addition to your warlock and shapeshift abilities. 3 minute cooldown.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells and your Imp's Firebolt spell by 60%.

You charge your off-hand weapon with lava, instantly dealing 110% off-hand Weapon damage. Damage is increased by 25% if your off-hand weapon is enchanted with Flametongue. Requires a one-handed weapon.

Removes any Immobilization effects and refreshes the cooldown of your Intercept ability.

This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
Increases your melee attack power by 1 for every 150 armor value you have.

Heals a friendly target for 448 to 484 and another 670 over 15 seconds. Your next Chain Heal cast on that primary target within 15 seconds will consume the healing over time effect and increase the amount of the Chain Heal by 25%.
When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum health for 20 seconds while in Bear Form, Cat Form, or Dire Bear Form. After the effect expires, the health is lost.
Swipe nearby enemies, inflicting 110% weapon damage.
Your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells gain an additional 7% and your Lava Burst gains an additional 8% of your bonus damage effects.
Taunts the target to attack you. If the target is tauntable and not currently targeting you, causes {1+0.5*AP} Holy damage.

Each time you deal a critical strike while in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form, you gain Savage Defense, reducing the damage taken from the next physical attack that strikes you by 25% of your attack power.

When you deal damage with your Corruption spell, you are instantly healed for 99% of the damage done. In addition, the damage done by your Corruption, Seed of Corruption and Unstable Affliction damage over time effects is increased by 5%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Demonic Empowerment, Metamorphosis, Inferno, Ritual of Doom, and Fel Domination spells by -10%.

When you Shadowbolt, Incinerate or Soul Fire a target that is at or below 35% health, the cast time of Soul Fire spell is reduced by 20% for 10 seconds. Soul Fires cast under the effect of Decimation cost no shard.
Reduces all damage taken by your Hellfire by -10% and when hit by a melee or ranged attack you have a 3% chance of increasing your Fire damage done by 10% for 10 seconds.
Increases the direct damage done by your Earth Shock, Flame Shock, and Frost Shock spells by an additional 10%.

Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lava Lash and Shock spells by 5% on targets afflicted by your Frostbrand Attack effect, and your Frost Shock has a 50% chance to root the target in ice for 5 seconds. when used on targets at or further than 15 yards from you.
Increases the damage reduction granted by your Barkskin spell by -5% and reduces the chance your Barkskin is dispelled by 35%.
Grants the periodic damage from your Lacerate and Rip abilities the ability to critically hit.
Reduces the mana cost of your Flash Heal by -5%, and increases the critical effect chance of your Flash Heal by 4% on friendly targets at or below 50% health.
Your Renew spell gains an additional 10% of your bonus healing effects, and your Renew will instantly heal the target for 5% of the total periodic effect.
Reduces the cooldown of your Power Word: Shield ability by 4 sec, and reduces the mana cost of your Power Word: Shield by -15%.
Increases the periodic damage done by your Devouring Plague by 5%, and when you cast Devouring Plague you instantly deal damage equal to 7% of its total periodic effect.
Increases all healing done by your holy spells and all holy healing effects on you by 1%.

When you heal with Binding Heal or Flash Heal, or deal damage with Smite, the cast time and mana cost of your next Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing spell is reduced by -5%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 20 seconds.
You terrify the target, causing them to tremble in horror for 3 seconds and drop their main hand and ranged weapons for 10 seconds.

When you cast Power Word: Shield, you increase the target's movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds, and you have a 50% chance when you cast Abolish Disease on yourself to also cleanse 1 poison effect in addition to diseases.

30% of all damage taken by party members within 30 yards is redirected to the Paladin (up to a maximum of 40% of the Paladin's health times the number of party members). Damage which reduces the Paladin below 20% health will break the effect. Lasts 10 seconds.

When below 35% health all damage taken is reduced by -3% and your Pyroblast spell's cast time is reduced by 1.2 secs while the cooldown is increased by 5 secs. In addition, melee and ranged auto attacks made against you have a 5% chance to disarm your attacker's main hand and ranged weapons.
Throws your weapon at the enemy causing {12+AP*.50} damage (based on attack power), reducing the armor on the target by -10% for 6 seconds or removing any invulnerabilities.
Following a Charge, your next Slam has an additional 25% chance to critically hit and Mortal Strike will apply Rend (if learned) when used within 10 sec.

Reduces the mana cost of your Druid healing over time spells by -20% and grants the ability to shapeshift into the Tree of Life. While in this form you increase healing received by 6% for all party and raid members within 100 yards, and you can only cast Restoration spells in addition to Innervate, Barkskin, Nature's Grasp and Thorns spells. The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.
Simultaneously places up to 4 totems specified in the Totem Bar.
Simultaneously places up to 4 totems specified in the Totem Bar. Can call different totems than Call of the Elements.
Simultaneously places up to 4 totems specified in the Totem Bar. Can call different totems than Call of the Elements or Call of the Ancestors.
Increases the damage of your Smite, Holy Fire, Holy Nova, Penance, and Exorcism spells by 20%.
Give ability to learn Portal Spells.
Increases the damage absorbed by your Mana Shield, Frost Ward, Fire Ward, and Ice Barrier by 10%.

Teaches you the necessary abilities to tame a pet companion.

(Tame Beast, Call Pet, Dismiss Pet, Feed Pet and Revive Pet.)
Automatically shoots the target until cancelled. Also increases your ranged attack speed by 33%.

Finishing move that consumes combo points on any nearby target to restore 1% of maximum health every 3 sec. Lasts longer per combo point: 1 point : 2% max health over 6 secs 2 points: 4% max health over 12 secs 3 points: 6% max health over 18 secs 4 points: 8% max health over 24 secs 5 points: 10% max health over 30 secs

Finishing move that consumes combo points on any nearby target to restore 1% of maximum mana every 3 sec. Lasts longer per combo point: 1 point : 2% max mana over 6 secs 2 points: 4% max mana over 12 secs 3 points: 6% max mana over 18 secs 4 points: 8% max mana over 24 secs 5 points: 10% max mana over 30 secs

While a one-handed weapon is equipped in both hands, your Mortal Strike, Overpower and Slam will trigger an additional attack with your off-hand weapon. These attacks deal 20% reduced damage to players. Equipping a dagger will cancel this effect.
